Hi Xavier, 

Thanks for your patience on this request. 

This task was delayed temporarily due to the rebrand being completed on the staging site. As a result of the staging environment, we need to perform the updates to both the live and staging websites to prevent a loss of data one the rebrand is complete. 

I have asked the dev team to prioritise this update and expect to share an update with you a little later today.

Any update on the trailer previews?

It is still showing that the page does not exist without backend access to preview (refer to image below). Perhaps a screenshot of the three trailers could be shared?
